channel.title: R Packages on Thinking for a living

item.title: SSN package tryout
item.description: Load SSN package. library(SSN) ## Warning: package 'SSN' was built under R version 3.4.4 ## Warning: package 'RSQLite' was built under R version 3.4.4 Simulate stream network First we simulate several stream networks in SSN object form. Sampling sites depicted as black hollow circles and prediction sites as green filled circles. # Delete any old simulations in the working directory unlink("simulated_network", recursive = TRUE) # Generate and save a simulated network my.
